text: Karima Adebibe (also known as Karima McAdams, born 14 February 1985) is an English actress and model. == Life and career == Adebibe was born in Bethnal Green, in Tower Hamlets, London, England and brought up in Tangier. She then again went back to the UK. Initially she worked as a secretary. In 2006, Adebibe was selected as the seventh model of Lara Croft, the fictional character in the video game series Tomb Raider. As the actress for the character she promoted the game series by demonstrating typical characteristics of the character like martial arts and elocution. She ceased to perform as the character in 2008. Adebibe was featured in the hot list of the British magazine Zoo. She also appeared in a role of the 2004 movie Alien vs. Predator. In 2009 she appeared in the movie Frontier Blues. == References == Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from London Category:People from the London Borough of Tower Hamlets
title: Karima Adebibe
